# init(filterPredicates:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a media query with a set of media property predicates.

## Declaration

```swift
init(filterPredicates: Set<MPMediaPredicate>?)
```

## Parameters

- **filterPredicates**: The set of media property predicates to use as a filter on the library.

## Return Value

An initialized media query.

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaPropertyPredicate] describes how to create media property predicates. The [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/general-media-item-property-keys] and `Podcast Item Property Keys` enumerations in [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaItem] contain the keys you can use to construct predicates.

## Creating media queries

- **albums()**: Creates a media query that matches music items and that groups and sorts collections by album name.
- **artists()**: Creates a media query that matches music items and that groups and sorts collections by artist name.
- **songs()**: Creates a media query that matches music items and that groups and sorts collections by song name.
- **playlists()**: Creates a media query that matches the entire library and that groups and sorts collections by playlist name.
- **podcasts()**: Creates a media query that matches podcast items and that groups and sorts collections by podcast name.
- **audiobooks()**: Creates a media query that matches audio book items and that groups and sorts collections by audio book name.
- **compilations()**: Creates a media query that matches compilation items and that groups and sorts collections by album name.
- **composers()**: Creates a media query that matches all media items and that groups and sorts collections by composer name.
- **genres()**: Creates a media query that matches all media items and that groups and sorts collections by genre name.
